parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

datasetStructure: One record per actual Repro Stage per subject

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SJ.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SJ.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain, which must be SJ.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SJ.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SJ.SJSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a USUBJID within this domain in chronological order. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: SJSEQ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SJ.RSTGCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the Repro Stage used for programming and sorting. Maximum 8 characters. Does not have special character restrictions.
datasetVariables.label: Repro Stage Code
datasetVariables.name: RSTGCD

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SJ.RSTAGE

datasetVariables.description: Name of the Repro Stage. If RSTGCD has the value of UNPLAN, then RSTAGE should be null.
datasetVariables.label: Description of Repro Stage
datasetVariables.name: RSTAGE

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SJ.SJSTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Start date/time for a Repro Stage for each subject in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: Start Date/Time of Repro Stage
datasetVariables.name: SJSTDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SJ.SJENDTC

datasetVariables.description: End date/time for a Repro Stage for each subject in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: End Date/Time of Repro Stage
datasetVariables.name: SJENDTC

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C124321

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SJ.RPHASE

datasetVariables.description: Name of the Reproductive Phase with which this Repro Stage of the Repro Path is associated. Defined in the TP domain. The RPHASE variable is required when any Repro Phase day variable is used.
datasetVariables.label: Repro Phase
datasetVariables.name: RPHASE

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicology Version 1.1

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable SJ.SJUPDES

datasetVariables.description: Description of what happened to the subject during an unplanned Repro Stage. Used only if RSTGCD has the value of "UNPLAN".
datasetVariables.label: Description of Unplanned Repro Stage
datasetVariables.name: SJUPDES

description: Describes the actual order of reproductive stages that were experienced by the subject, together with the start date/time and end date/time for each reproductive stage. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C95099, 2018-06-29)
label: Subject Repro Stages
name: SJ
